com.jme3.network.streaming
Class StreamingService

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.network.events.MessageAdapter
      com.jme3.network.streaming.StreamingService
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageListener, Service
public class StreamingService
extends MessageAdapter
implements Service

Streaming service handles all kinds of streaming to clients. It can be instantiated by both the client and server, where server will work as sender, and client as receiver.
